channel.title: CVE Feed for wp-buy -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for wp-buy -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-38704|2024-09-17T02:41:17.029Z -- wp-buy -- seo%20redirection%20plugin%20%E2%80%93%20301%20redirect%20manager%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in SEO Redirection plugin <= 8.9 at WordPress, leading to deletion of 404 errors and redirection history.

item.title: CVE-2023-51484|2024-08-02T22:32:10.191Z -- wp-buy -- login%20as%20user%20or%20customer%20%28user%20switching%29
item.description: Improper Authentication vulnerability in wp-buy Login as User or Customer (User Switching) allows Privilege Escalation.This issue affects Login as User or Customer (User Switching): from n/a through 3.8.

item.description: Improper Authentication vulnerability in wp-buy Login as User or Customer (User Switching) allows Privilege Escalation.This issue affects Login as User or Customer (User Switching): from n/a through 3.8.
